summary: Integration test suite that validates the IPAdapter's functionality within Stable Diffusion pipelines, covering image-to-image, inpainting, multi‑prompt, various text‑to‑image scenarios (including face ID handling), model CPU offload, and proper unloading behavior.
business_intent: Guarantee the quality and stability of the IPAdapter feature set for production releases, ensuring reliable image generation across different use cases and efficient resource management.
